perturbation.original_text: Subject to Emdeon's compliance with the provisions of this Agreement, Emdeon is hereby authorized and licensed to use the Content by making such Content available to third parties verbatim or as source material via the Software. Such license is a non-exclusive, non-transferrable and worldwide license and shall include the right to use, reproduce, copy and publish the Content solely in connection with the Software. Emdeon may determine the placement and formatting of the Content in the Software, but may not change the substance of the Content to any extent whatsoever without WebMD's written approval of the change.
perturbation.changed_text: Subject to Emdeon's compliance with the provisions of this Agreement, Emdeon is hereby authorized and licensed to use the Content by making such Content available to third parties verbatim or as source material via the Software. Such license is a non-exclusive, non-transferrable and worldwide license and shall include the right to use, reproduce, copy and publish the Content solely in connection with the Software. Emdeon may determine the placement and formatting of the Content in the Software, and changes to the substance of the Content can be made at their discretion without WebMD's approval.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states Emdeon cannot change the substance of the content without WebMD's approval. The modified text directly contradicts this by stating Emdeon can change the substance of the content at their discretion, creating uncertainty about editing rights.

perturbation.original_text: Upon mutual agreement, this Agreement may be renewed for one (1) additional one (1) year term upon the expiration of the Initial Term.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement shall automatically renew for successive one (1) year terms unless either party provides written notice of termination at least thirty (30) days prior to the end of the current term. Upon mutual agreement, this Agreement may be terminated during the current term by both parties with written consent.
perturbation.explanation: The original text required mutual agreement for renewal. The modification introduces an automatic renewal clause. The addition of the 'mutual agreement to terminate' during the active term adds conflict. It is now unclear if agreement is needed just to terminate or continues to be needed for renewal.
perturbation.location: TERMS AND CONDITIONS, 3. Term and Termination. (a) Term.

perturbation.original_text: Late payments are subject to an interest charge, at the lower rate of (i) one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month, or (ii) the maximum legal rate.
perturbation.changed_text: Late payments may be subject to an interest charge, which will be determined by WebMD on a case-by-case basis and may range from zero percent (0%) to two percent (2%) per month. WebMD retains the right to waive interest charges at its sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines a clear interest rate for late payments. The modified text introduces ambiguity by making the interest charge discretionary and waivable, leading to uncertainty about the financial consequences of late payments and contradicts the original fixed rate.
perturbation.location: TERMS AND CONDITIONS, 4. Fees and Payment. (c) Late payments
